T02D2338:302b-1: karna tantra badzra pa da n'a ma /
T02D2338:302b-3: snyan brgyud rdo rje'i tshig rkang zhes bya ba /
T02D2338:302b-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2338:302b-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi yang dag gsang ba'i mchog / ye shes rgyal po thig le mchog gi lam //
T02D2338:302b-7: tshig tu brjod pa kun dang bral ba'i don //
T02D2338:302b-8: theg chen skye med rang sgra 'di skad thos //
T02D2338:302b-9: rdo rje 'chang ngas skal ldan don du bshad //
T02D2338:302b-10: gus btud nas ni ye shes mkha' 'gro nyon //
T02D2338:303a-1: gsum rgyan ldan nyams myong bla ma'i mchog / dad brtson shes rab snying rje slob ma'o //
T02D2338:303a-2: nyes dmigs dran pas tshe 'di'i bya ba btang //
T02D2338:303a-3: thog mar 'khor lo sdom pa la brten nas //
T02D2338:303a-4: drug cu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor dbang bzhi bskur //
T02D2338:303a-5: lha mo bco lnga dbang bzhi brda yis mtshon //
T02D2338:303a-6: smin par byas nas thabs shes zung du sbrel //
T02D2338:303a-7: rgyal po blon sogs rnal 'byor bdun la 'bad //
T02D2338:303a-8: bsre ba ro snyoms dam tshig gsum la sbyar //
T02D2338:303a-9: gtum mo bde drod rang 'bar lam gyi gzhung //
T02D2338:303a-10: lus gnad bdun ldan lha sku'i stong ra gnad //
T02D2338:303a-11: dh'u t'i la la ras 'khor lo bzhi //
T02D2338:303a-12: aa ham 'bar 'dzag srog rtsol thur sel gcud //
T02D2338:303a-13: rdo rje bzlas pa rtsa ba'i rlung lnga bsgom //
T02D2338:303a-14: zin dang brtan pa shes rab snyoms par 'jug / dga' bzhi goms pas rtsa rlung thig le 'dres //
T02D2338:303a-15: dh'u t'ir rlung sems tshud pas mi rtog pa //
T02D2338:303a-16: nyon mongs rang zhi bde gsal rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D2338:303a-17: ngo bo mthong nas chos sku'i ngang du gnas //
T02D2338:303a-18: bogs 'don sgyu lus chos brgyad rang grol la //
T02D2338:303a-19: 'khor 'das thams cad sgyu mar shes byas te //
T02D2338:303a-20: sgyu ma'ang 'ja' tshon chu zla lta bu'o //
T02D2338:303a-21: da ltar snang ba dngos po'i chos rnams ni ;
T02D2338:303a-22: / bden cing rtag na 'gyur bar ga la rigs //
T02D2338:303a-23: 'khrul gzugs yin phyir don la grub pa med //
T02D2338:303a-24: gzugs rnams snang stong sgra rnams brag car ltos //
T02D2338:303a-25: gnyis 'dzin zhig pas chags sdang kun dang bral //
T02D2338:303a-26: de ltar shes pas sna tshogs zhen med spyod //
T02D2338:303a-27: 'ja' lus chos sku thob par 'gyur ro kye //
T02D2338:303a-28: mtshan dus rmi lam 'khrul pa rang sangs la //
T02D2338:303a-29: sgo gsum 'bad pa dran pa'i lcags kyus gzung //
T02D2338:303a-30: 'dzin sbyangs spel bsgyur sprul cing gegs rnams sel //
T02D2338:303a-31: nyi zla zhon dang zhing khams mtha' dag bgrod //
T02D2338:303a-32: bzang ngan sgyu ma cir snang rang grol ltos //
T02D2338:303a-33: mthar phyin sa bcu non nas don chen thob //
T02D2338:303a-34: khyad par 'od gsal ma rig mun bral la //
T02D2338:303a-35: lus gnad thabs ldan ting 'dzin bzhi la sbyor //
T02D2338:303a-36: thig le gus ldan dug gsum 'dzin med ltos //
T02D2338:303a-37: gnyid dang rmi lam rnam rtog bar nas bzung //
T02D2338:303b-0: rim pa bzhi dang nyin mtshan @303b bsre zhing goms //
T02D2338:303b-1: gsal stong 'dzin bral lhan skyes ye shes de //
T02D2338:303b-2: brjod du med pa 'od gsal rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D2338:303b-3: ma rtogs sbyang zhing phyag rgya chen por blta //
T02D2338:303b-4: 'pho ba gser 'gyur ma bsgoms sangs rgyas ni //
T02D2338:303b-5: 'chi ltas shar tshe dga' zhing zhen pa btang //
T02D2338:303b-6: sgo dgu bkag la rdzas dang smon lam rgyan //
T02D2338:303b-7: h'um dang rlung sems dbyer med dh'u t'ir drang //
T02D2338:303b-8: ksha yig gsal la tshangs pa'i lam nas 'phang //
T02D2338:303b-9: chos sku bla ma rgyal ba'i zhing du 'pho //
T02D2338:303b-10: lhag par grong 'jug sprul lpags 'dor len ni //
T02D2338:303b-11: rlung sems dbang thob bskyed rdzogs brtan pa yis //
T02D2338:303b-12: skyon med ro la rnam shes yig 'bru 'phang //
T02D2338:303b-13: dus yul rdzas dang gnad shes mngon du gyur //
T02D2338:303b-14: the tshom bral ba'i skyes bu gzhan don spyod //
T02D2338:303b-15: mkha' 'gro'i gsang ba bde ba chen po ni //
T02D2338:303b-16: bcu drug nyer lnga'i bar gyi rig ma ni //
T02D2338:303b-17: padma ri dags dung can la sogs pa //
T02D2338:303b-18: phyag rgya mtshan ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
T02D2338:303b-19: skal ldan skyes bu he ru ka lta bu //
T02D2338:303b-20: gnyis med 'khril sbyor zag bcas zag med rol //
T02D2338:303b-21: thig le dbab bzung bzlog dgram gnas su spel //
T02D2338:303b-22: bya rgod gcud la sang ge glang chen dang //
T02D2338:303b-23: rma bya stag mo rus sbal la sogs bya //
T02D2338:303b-24: dga' ba bzhi gsum bcu gnyis don la blta //
T02D2338:303b-25: lhan skyes ye shes rang bzhin dbyer med ston //
T02D2338:303b-26: snang srid thams cad zag med bde bar 'char //
T02D2338:303b-27: gsang dbang phyag rgya bdud rtsi ril bu'i phyir //
T02D2338:303b-28: thig le bcu drug phyed phyed bzhi cha sbyin //
T02D2338:303b-29: bzhi gsum 'khor lo dag la dgram par bya //
T02D2338:303b-30: bag med 'dod sred gzhan dbang chang gis myos //
T02D2338:303b-31: don la nyams shing slar yang ngan song ltung //
T02D2338:303b-32: des na rdo rje'i lus la gnad du bsnun //
T02D2338:303b-33: tshe 'dir sangs rgyas ster bar the tshom med //
T02D2338:303b-34: phyag rgya chen po ye shes gsal byed ni //
T02D2338:303b-35: sgo gsum g-yo med sgo lnga ha dang sa gzhag
T02D2338:303b-36: / bltas pas mthong med sems kyi mtshan nyid ltos
T02D2338:303b-37: // dmigs su med pas ma bcos rang sor gzhag
T02D2338:303b-38: / gzhan du ma tshol ngo bo rtogs par gyis
T02D2338:303b-39: // // gzhi nas ma bcos ye nas lhun grub la //
T02D2338:303b-40: tha mal rang lugs chen por bzhag pa na //
T02D2338:304a-0: 'pho 'gyur med pa nam mkha'i klong yangs su @304a * //
T02D2338:304a-1: skye shi med pa chos sku'i lus mthong 'gyur //
T02D2338:304a-2: phyi rol yul sems chos rnams ji snyed pa //
T02D2338:304a-3: rang sems yin phyir gzhan na grub pa med //
T02D2338:304a-4: 'khrul rtog gnyis 'dzin sna tshogs gang shar rnams //
T02D2338:304a-5: cir snang gzhi med rang byung rang brlag ltas //
T02D2338:304a-6: sems nyid skye med stong pa ches kyi sku //
T02D2338:304a-7: 'gag med gsal dangs gang shar sprul pa'i sku //
T02D2338:304a-8: gnas med bde chen zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs //
T02D2338:304a-9: phyag ni gnyis med ye shes ngo yis zin //
T02D2338:304a-10: rgya ni 'khor ba'i mdud pa dral bas bde //
T02D2338:304a-11: chen po zung 'jug sgron me bltams pa las /
T02D2338:304a-12: gzhan gyis ma yin rang grol chos sku'o //
T02D2338:304a-13: sgrib gnyis rang dag gzung 'dzin mtha' dang bral //
T02D2338:304a-14: 'du shes blo dang 'khor 'das chos rnams zang //
T02D2338:304a-15: mkhyen tshad yon tan ji snyed rang la rdzogs //
T02D2338:304a-16: bsam brjod blo 'das sangs rgyas rang 'khrungs yin //
T02D2338:304a-17: bar do ngo sprod yang dag zab don bstan //
T02D2338:304a-18: skye shi rmi lam srid pa'i bar do gcod //
T02D2338:304a-19: bltar med bltas pas mthong med mthong ba'i mchog /
T02D2338:304a-20: rang rig gsal stong mi rtog sgrib ga yogs bral
T02D2338:304a-21: // bde chen chos dbyings ye shes rnam par dag
T02D2338:304a-22: / rang bzhin dbyer med sku gsum rang shar ltos
T02D2338:304a-23: // // ma rtogs lus ldan bar do rnam gsum la //
T02D2338:304a-24: bskyed rim sgyu lus 'od gsal chos sku 'dre //
T02D2338:304a-25: sa chu me rlung 'byung ba rim gyis thim //
T02D2338:304a-26: brgyad cu 'gags nas snang ba gsum 'das te //
T02D2338:304a-27: dkar dmar sems gsum chu skyes nang du 'dzom //
T02D2338:304a-28: 'od gsal ngos 'dzin ma bu dbyer med 'dre //
T02D2338:304a-29: chos sku sangs rgyas dbang po yang rab bo //
T02D2338:304a-30: de ma zin na rlung gsum rkyen gyis 'ching //
T02D2338:304a-31: 'bring po chu la nya ltar longs skur 'gyur //
T02D2338:304a-32: rtsal lnga zer lnga dug gsum las kyi dbang //
T02D2338:304a-33: chags sdang gnyis kyis mngal du 'jug 'gyur bas //
T02D2338:304a-34: bsre ba lnga ldan lam khyer phyag rgya bzhi //
T02D2338:304a-35: sngar sbyangs ldan pas bar do rang grol 'gyur //
T02D2338:304a-36: tha mas chags sdang grol nas sprul sku thob //
T02D2338:304a-37: gdams pa spyi la gegs bsal bdud dngos bzung //
T02D2338:304a-38: rtsa ba drug la yan lag so dgu yi //
T02D2338:304a-39: rdo rje lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gnad du bsnun //
T02D2338:304b-0: bya spyod thams cad tshogs su @304b bsgyur bar bya //
T02D2338:304b-1: go rims ma nor nyams su blangs gyur na //
T02D2338:304b-2: skad cig bzhi la dga' ba gsum ston te //
T02D2338:304b-3: dangs ma yas byon 'gyu ba mas brten pa //
T02D2338:304b-4: rtsa mdud rim pas grol nas dh'u t'ir 'gyur //
T02D2338:304b-5: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya rtsa ba lnga //
T02D2338:304b-6: rlung dang nyon mongs 'gags nas ye shes 'gyur //
T02D2338:304b-7: gnas dang nye gnas nyi shu bzhi la sogs //
T02D2338:304b-8: p'ulli ma ru yar chad gang bar 'gyur //
T02D2338:304b-9: sprul sku longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhal ston cing //
T02D2338:304b-10: mngon shes yon tan brgya dang ther 'bum thob //
T02D2338:304b-11: dus 'dir sa lam rim pa sgong byed de //
T02D2338:304b-12: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
T02D2338:304b-13: bcu gsum bar du tshig rgyud rgya yis gdab //
T02D2338:304b-14: mdo rgyud kun gyi snying po 'di yin pas //
T02D2338:304b-15: skal ldan grol phyir gsang ba'i nges don mdzod //
T02D2338:304b-16: ces ye shes mkha' 'gro mal gdams pa /
T02D2338:304b-17: snyan brgyud rdo rje'i tshig rkang rdzogs so /
T02D2338:304b-19: // / mkhas pa n'a ro pan chen gyi zhal snga dang /
T02D2338:304b-20: lo ts'a ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis
